ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen bite-size potato nuggets (such as Tater Tots®)
1 tablespoon gochujang (Korean hot pepper paste), or more to taste

cookingTips: Start with less gochujang and add gradually to control heat level
Keep cheese sauce warm over low heat and whisk frequently to prevent separation
Serve immediately after drizzling sauce while tater tots are still crispy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you balance the spice and richness of gochujang with the creaminess of the cheese sauce?
